name: Loud Cloud the Lightning Breather
text: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY by banishing 1 FIRE or 1 WIND monster from your hand or GY. If this card is Summoned: You can send 1 Reptile monster from your Deck to the GY. If this card is sent from your Deck to the GY: Add 1 "Loud Cloud" card from your Deck to your Hand. You can only use each effect of "Loud Cloud the Lightning Breather" once per turn.
